body:
@lindstro @GarrettDMorrison could you please consider commenting the `utilities` variant and corresponding configure logic in the ZFP package?  Right now, I just have a private fork of the zfp package with this done, but it would be nice not to maintain this in the long run.

I tested it recently and it seems to work, and I wasn't sure why it was marked as a TODO.
title: zfp, please uncomment `utilities` variant
